com.hp.autonomy.iod.client.api.search

Interface GetContentService


  • public interface GetContentService
    Interface representing the QueryTextIndex API.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String URL 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Documents getContent(List<String> indexReference, String indexes, Map<String,Object> params)
      Query IDOL OnDemand for documents matching query text using an API key provided by a RequestInterceptor
      Documents getContent(String apiKey, List<String> indexReference, String indexes, Map<String,Object> params)
      Query IDOL OnDemand for documents matching query text using the given API key

    • Field Detail

      • URL

        static final String URL
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getContent

        @GET(value="/api/sync/getcontent/v1")
Documents getContent(@Query(value="index_reference")
                       List<String> indexReference,
                       @Query(value="indexes")
                       String indexes,
                       @QueryMap
                       Map<String,Object> params)
                     throws IodErrorException
        Query IDOL OnDemand for documents matching query text using an API key provided by a RequestInterceptor
        Parameters:
        indexReference - The reference list of the documents you want to view
        indexes - The index the document resides in
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of documents that match the query text
        Throws:
        IodErrorException

      • getContent

        @GET(value="/api/sync/getcontent/v1")
Documents getContent(@Query(value="apiKey")
                       String apiKey,
                       @Query(value="index_reference")
                       List<String> indexReference,
                       @Query(value="indexes")
                       String indexes,
                       @QueryMap
                       Map<String,Object> params)
                     throws IodErrorException
        Query IDOL OnDemand for documents matching query text using the given API key
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key to use to authenticate the request
        indexReference - The reference list of the documents you want to view
        indexes - The index the document resides in
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of documents that match the query text
        Throws:
        IodErrorException
